title: CV-APP
description: A resume builder app with dynamic forms, real-time preview, and PDF generation. Practiced component reuse, form validation, and state management.

title: FlappyBird
description: Flappy Bird clone built using <canvas>. Practiced collision detection, animation, and performance optimization.

title: Counter
description: A simple counter app with increment, decrement, and reset. Used React hooks for state control.

title: Portfolio Website
description: A personal portfolio with project sections, client testimonials, and contact form. Designed for presenting professional experience.

title: GIFS-APP
description: GIF search app using GIPHY API. Implemented dynamic routing, trending/random GIFs, and async data handling.

title: Gallery
description: Image gallery using Pixabay API and SimpleLightbox. Features dynamic loading, pagination, and modal display.

title: Website (HTML/CSS)
description: Responsive static website with semantic HTML and adaptive design, built with focus on clean structure and web standards.
